text: Rebecca Maria Hall (born 3 May 1982) is an English actress. She acts in both movies and television shows. Her movies are the independent type. She was born near London, England.Births, Marriages & Deaths Index of England & Wales, 1916â€“2005. Gives name at birth as "Rebecca Maria Hall". Her father is stage director Peter Hall. She won the British Academy Television Award for her role in the movie Red Riding: In the Year of Our Lord 1974. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:English child actors Category:English stage actors
title: Rebecca Hall
